# Tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Tooltip component displays content relative to a target when a particular action occurs.

## Usage

### Interaction

```jsx live
<BrTooltip interaction="click">
  <BrButton slot="target">
    <span>Click to open tooltip</span>
  </BrButton>
  <BrTooltipContent>
    <span>Tooltip content</span>
  </BrTooltipContent>
</BrTooltip>
```


### Key example

```jsx live
<BrTooltip>
  <BrButton slot="target">
    <span>Hover to open tooltip</span>
  </BrButton>
  <BrTooltipContent>
    <span>Tooltip content</span>
  </BrTooltipContent>
</BrTooltip>
```


### Match target width

```jsx live
<BrTooltip constrainToTargetWidth={true}>
  <BrInput width="240px" placeholder="Type in a value" slot="target"></BrInput>
  <BrTooltipContent>
    <span>This tooltip matches the input width</span>
  </BrTooltipContent>
</BrTooltip>
```


### Placement

```jsx live
<BrTooltip placement="right">
  <BrButton slot="target">
    <span>Hover to open tooltip</span>
  </BrButton>
  <BrTooltipContent>
    <span>This tooltip shows to the right of the target</span>
  </BrTooltipContent>
</BrTooltip>
```


### Tooltip arrow

```jsx live
<BrTooltip showArrow={false}>
  <BrButton slot="target">
    <span>Hover to open tooltip</span>
  </BrButton>
  <BrTooltipContent>
    <span>No tooltip arrow</span>
  </BrTooltipContent>
</BrTooltip>
```

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | `false`                           |


## Events

| Event   | Description                               | Type                |
| ------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `close` | Event that emits when the tooltip closes. | `CustomEvent<void>` |
| `open`  | Event that emits when the tooltip opens.  | `CustomEvent<void>` |


## Methods

### `closeElement() => Promise<void>`

A method to close the tooltip.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`



### `openElement(anchor?: globalThis.Element | TooltipTargetBox) => Promise<void>`

A method to open the tooltip.

#### Parameters

| Name     | Type                                       | Description |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `anchor` | `Element \| TooltipTargetBox \| undefined` |             |

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`




## Slots

| Slot       | Description                               |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------------- |
|            | Passes content to the Tooltip.            |
| `"target"` | Passes the target element of the Tooltip. |


----------------------------------------------
